snippet.title: 9 Hot New Shooters All Free to Play on Core Right Now
snippet.description:
Fight to the finish in these 9 new online multiplayer arena shooters that you can jump into with friends, and play for free. Visit https://www.coregames.com/ to download, play, and create for free in our Open Alpha. Play all the games in this video for free by clicking the links below:

District 7:
https://www.coregames.com/games/fdeaaa/district-7

Street Wars:
https://www.coregames.com/games/140126/street-wars

Battle Tendency :
https://www.coregames.com/games/a29a7c/aocframework

Sentry Crater by Estlogic:
https://www.coregames.com/games/889d98/sentry-crater

Core Legends :
https://www.coregames.com/games/2127aa/d-and-f-ctf2

Arboretum by Professional Designer Sukhraj:
https://www.coregames.com/games/e5b2a6/arboretum

Damned Valley by Nanimoon:
https://www.coregames.com/games/454a4b/damned-valley

Paint Brawl by Cptdeas:
https://www.coregames.com/games/93757d/paintbrawl

BlockBuster Arena by CosmicKiwi:
https://www.coregames.com/games/35ee94/sko-block-buster-arena

Thanks for watching! Comment, Like, Subscribe, and Share! 

Check us out on:
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/CoreGames
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/CoreLive
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playcoregames/
Discord: https://discord.gg/85k8A7V

Core is an endless universe of games and worlds designed by a global community of creators. It's a radically accessible game construction kit, content exchange, and game-playing platform, all in one. With Core, you can create multiplayer games, using the power of Unreal Engine, with no coding or art skills required. When you're ready to share your creations, publish them to the Core platform where they'll be instantly available to play. Core has everything you need to bring your idea to life and reach millions of gamers - it’s your own personal game studio!

Core is free and in Open Alpha. Start creating and playing now!

Try Core today by signing up at https://coregames.com | Core API Documentation & Tutorials: https://docs.coregames.com | Core Creator Forums: https://forums.coregames.com
